title: Schama on Civilisations
itunes:title: Schama on Civilisations
itunes:subtitle: As the major new BBC arts history series Civilisations is due to air, we speak to Simon Schama, one of its three presenters, to discuss the making of the series and how he was inspired by Kenneth Clark’s original
description:
